Pre-Game Insights: Pakistan and Sri Lanka will clash against each other in the last match of Super 4 stage, before meeting in the finals in Asia Cup 2022.
Both teams are in good form and the match between Pakistan and Sri Lanka in the Super 4 stage is expected to be a close contest.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Pakistan registered two victories in their first two matches of the Super 4 stage, against India and then a nail-biter against Afghanistan.
The Lankan team has displayed what can be called a perfect team performance.
Spinner Mohammad Nawaz is currently the highest wicket-taker in Asia Cup 2022 with 8 wickets to his name in 4 matches.
Kusal Mendis has been the highest run scorer for Sri Lanka in Asia Cup 2022 and the second highest run scorer overall with 155 runs in 4 matches.
Others: PAK vs SL Head-to-Head: Total – 21, Pakistan – 13, Sri Lanka – 08, Tied – 00, No Result – 00
